translations.Takes a link and adds it to your collect: Takes a link and adds it to your collection of bookmarks.
translations.Collect and manage bookmarks, synced wit: Collect and manage bookmarks, synced with all your devices
translations.- üìÇ Sort bookmarks into folders\n- ü:
- üìÇ Sort bookmarks into folders
- üè∑ Add tags and personal notes
- ‚ò† Find broken links and duplicates
- üì≤ Synchronize with all your browsers and devices
- üìî Store archived versions of your links in case they are depublished
- üîç Full-text search on site contents
- üë™ Share bookmarks with other users and via public links
- ‚öõ Generate RSS feeds of your collections
- üìà Stats on how often you access which links
- üîí Automatic backups of your bookmarks collection
- üíº Built-in Dashboard widgets for frequent and recent links

Requirements:
 - PHP extensions:
   - intl: *
   - mbstring: *
 - when using MySQL, use at least v8.0
translations.You have never clicked this link: You have never clicked this link
translations.You have clicked this link {count} times: You have clicked this link {count} times
translations.Do you really want to delete this bookma: Do you really want to delete this bookmark?
translations.This content is being downloaded for off: This content is being downloaded for offline use. Please check back later.
translations.Bookmarks to files on the web like photo: Bookmarks to files on the web like photos or PDFs will automatically be saved to your Nextcloud files, so you can still find them even when the link goes offline.
Searching in the current folder only.
translations.Bookmarked links are checked regularly a: Bookmarked links are checked regularly and the ones that cannot be reached are listed here.
translations.You can share bookmark folders with othe: You can share bookmark folders with others. All folders shared with you are listed here.
translations.One bookmark can be in multiple folders: One bookmark can be in multiple folders at once. Updating it will update all copies. All duplicated bookmarks are listed here for convenience.
translations.Do you really want to delete these items: Do you really want to delete these items?
translations.Copy RSS Feed of current view: Copy RSS Feed of current view
translations.The RSS feed requires authentication wit: The RSS feed requires authentication with your Nextcloud credentials
translations.This app allows you to manage links to y: This app allows you to manage links to your favourite places on the web. Sort your bookmarks into folders, label them with tags and share them with others! The app will regularly check all your links for availability and display unavailable links. If you add a link to a file on the web, the file will be automatically downloaded to your Nextcloud Files. You can also import bookmarks exported from other services or directly sync bookmarks from all your browsers with this app.
translations.Do you really want to permanently delete: Do you really want to permanently delete this folder?
translations.Bookmarks to files like photos or PDFs w: Bookmarks to files like photos or PDFs will automatically be saved to your Nextcloud files, so you can still find them even when the link goes offline.
translations.Your search yielded no results in the cu: Your search yielded no results in the current folder.
translations.Add bookmarks manually or import bookmar: Add bookmarks manually or import bookmarks from a HTML file.
translations.The bookmarks app can automatically arch: The bookmarks app can automatically archive the web content of links you have bookmarked
translations.Enter the path of a folder in your Files: Enter the path of a folder in your Files where bookmarked files should be stored.
translations.The bookmarks app can automatically back: The bookmarks app can automatically backup your bookmarks on a daily basis to prevent data loss when syncing bookmarks across devices.
translations.Enter the path of a folder in your Files: Enter the path of a folder in your Files where backups will be stored.
translations.Also check out the collection of client: Also check out the collection of client apps that integrate with this app:
translations.You can install this app on your device: You can install this app on your device home screen to quickly access your bookmarks on your phone. You can easily remove the app from your home screen again, if you don't like it.
translations.Drag this to your browser bookmarks and: Drag this to your browser bookmarks and click it to quickly bookmark a webpage.
translations.If you have problems with this Bookmarks: If you have problems with this Bookmarks app or have an idea about what could be improved, don't hesitate to get in touch by clicking here.
translations.My work on this Bookmarks app is fuelled: My work on this Bookmarks app is fuelled by a voluntary subscription model. If you think what I do is worthwhile, I would be happy if you could support my work. Also, please consider giving the app a review on the Nextcloud app store. Thank you üíô
translations.Please select \"Add to home screen\" in: Please select "Add to home screen" in your browser menu
translations.Title: Title
translations.Select tags and create new ones: Select tags and create new ones
translations.The app will try to access web pages tha: The app will try to access web pages that you add to automatically add information about them.
translations.Enable accessing and collecting informat: Enable accessing and collecting information from the web pages you add
translations.In an installation with a lot of users i: In an installation with a lot of users it may be useful to restrict the number of bookmarks per account.
translations.Maximum allowed number of bookmarks per: Maximum allowed number of bookmarks per account. (0 for no limit; default is no limit)
translations.In order to display real screenshots of: In order to display real screenshots of your bookmarked websites, the app can use third-party services to generate previews.
translations.You can either sign up for free at scree: You can either sign up for free at screeenly.com or setup your own server.
translations.Sign up with any of the screenshot API p: Sign up with any of the screenshot API providers and put the API URL below. Use the variable {url} as a placeholder for the URL to screenshot. The API must return only the image directly.
translations.Simply install the Pageres CLI by Sindre: Simply install the Pageres CLI by Sindre Sorhus on your server and Bookmarks will find it. You can still add additional ENV vars to be fed to pageres, e.g. as indicated in the placeholder:
translations.This URL is already bookmarked! Overwrit: This URL is already bookmarked! Overwrite?
translations.Network access is disabled by default. G: Network access is disabled by default. Go to administrator settings for the bookmarks app to allow fetching previews and favicons.
translations.Leave a rating on the Nextcloud App Stor: Leave a rating on the Nextcloud App Store
translations.No links found in this message: No links found in this message
